metadata.description: Import of data into Visma Løn via decentralized registration, including requirements for file format and fields.

content:
| 15 | O | Country code | 2 | Characters(Mandatory) |   | Mandatory for creating a new employee.If the employee has a foreign address a value should always be provided for this fieldIf left blank the code will automatic be set to DK |
| 16 | P | Seniority | 6 | Numeric | YYMMDD | The length of the employee’s employment in number of years months and daysCan be deleted by entering % into the fieldFormat: YYMMDD |
| 17 | Q | Request tax card type | 1 | Characters | H = Hovedkort (taxrate and deduction card)B = Bikort (secondary taxcard) | A tax card can only be requested when creating a new employee. If an existing employee having a new salary number is created the field must be left blank |
| 18 | R | Request date | 8 | Date | DDMMYYYY | The effective date of the e-tax card.If no tax card i requested the field must be left blank |
